summary: Senior IT manager with 12+ years of experience and strong interpersonal skills. Particular strength in process improvement, analytical thinking and prioritizing effectively. Proven record of successful technical implementation projects and excellent technical knowledge in the wide area of systems and solutions. Experienced in influencing and leading change that drives efficiency and profitability in the organization. I am recognized for my productivity, proactive attitude and for taking responsibility.

location.default: Bergen op Zoom, North Brabant, Netherlands

courses.name: Managing Projects - Comprehensive introductory course into PMBOK

profile_positions.description: Technical Analyst in the Global IT EMEA Operations & Supply Chain team.
profile_positions.title: OSC Technical Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for the end-to-end scope of the IT Service Delivery, including IT Infrastructure, Manufacturing, Applications, ERP, Business Analytics and Cyber Security
•	Accountable for the IT Project Portfolio
•	Build trusted partnership with the country management teams to align the IT road maps with business priorities
•	Stakeholder management, interdepartmental communication and budget management
profile_positions.title: IT Business Relationship Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Acted as supporting contact to BUs/Function leaders and managers to assist in the successful introduction of new solutions, technologies, and applications to enable business process
•	Coordinate across the team to identify opportunities for continuous improvement
•	Maintain professional relationships across a diverse, multifaceted global organization
•	Developed knowledge to understand business requirements and needs
•	Assisted in analyzing and categorizing reports for SLA service performance
•	Lead the execution of ad hoc projects
•	Provided support in evaluating project feasibility of new solutions for the business/function and identifying risks and constraints
•	Collected, compiled, and documented business requirements for the solution and collected input required for business case development
•	Provided support in change management, communication and training to ensure successful implementation of the projects
profile_positions.title: IT Business Relationship Manager Generalist

profile_positions.description:
Lead the End User Computing domain within a major acquisition program of the Cargill Premix and Nutrition BU. The goal of this project is to transition of all CPN Infrastructure services to third party managed services provider. I lead the EUC transition team consisting of internal staff and members of the 3rd party managed service provider.

• Leading migration of client infrastructure environment to corporate standards. Including hardware standardization, rollout of standard corporate image and client application rationalization.
• Migrate client infrastructure of 50+ locations globally
• Ensure proper handover of support activities to managed service provider
• Engage in on-site implementation activities
• Review and approve project phase criteria and deliverables 
• Manage performance of managed service provider
profile_positions.title: EUC Domain Lead in Provimi Transition and Migration Project

profile_positions.description:
Leading a Workplace Services (Field Services) team of 4 people at the CPN site in Rotterdam. 

Responsibilities include:
• Manage 2nd line support team supporting 7 sites in 5 countries
• Service 600+ clients in office and plant environment
• Project Management; overall responsibility for successful project delivery, including project coordination
• Client systems integration as part of acquisition
profile_positions.title: Workplace Services lead

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
• Lead project teams of 5 members on average
• Managed medium rigor projects with budgets below €100.000 and up to 500 hours.
• Experienced in working in project teams with members from various IT teams and business contacts and vendors.
• Created forecasts with 60 projects to predict team workload.
• Managed team resources and assigned them to projects based on the required knowledge and skills.
• Lead a continuous improvement initiative on multiple locations.

Achievements:
• Successfully integrated client infrastructure during multiple acquisitions. 
Coordinated a team which started the client integration of locations in NL, BE and UK, including hardware replacement, software rationalization and user account management.
•  On average I coordinated 10 projects simultaneously without causing any delay.
• Created project forecast which was the primary input for our teams’ resource management.
• Increased productivity and decreased stock of field services departments by 50% after organizing 5S sessions.
profile_positions.title: IT Support Analyst - Project Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities
• Dispatched Incidents to a team of 25 2nd line support analysts located in Belgium, The Netherlands, Ghana and Ivory Coast.
• Ensured incident management processes are followed correctly.
• Problem management

Achievements
• Was actively engaged in improving existing processes to increase team efficiency.
• Trained up new colleagues
profile_positions.title: IT Support Analyst - Group Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Provided remote 2nd Line Support to 25+ locations in The Netherlands and Belgium. Involved in the execution of infrastructure projects such as file and print server replacements, printer- and client life cycling and operating system and software upgrades.
profile_positions.title: IT Support Analyst - 2nd Line Support
